title: [Large-scale] Difficulty Factor Approach-Based Mathematics Learning Course for Intelligent Tutoring System Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of introductory statistics concepts (scatter plots, correlation) and basic programming knowledge
context.additional_context: Intelligent tutoring system development project to improve scatter plot analysis skills through learner-specific difficulty adjustments

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain three or more major error factors occurring during scatterplot analysis
Learners can design personalized tutoring content by applying a difficulty factor approach
Learners can improve intelligent tutoring systems through an iterative design process (analysis-development-evaluation-revision)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
